text: @HillaryClinton @WHO Maybe if the @WHO didn’t take China at their word and didn’t downplay the COVID-19 we wouldn’t be in this mess. Everybody’s blaming Trump when he was taking the recommendations of their experts.  Just imagine how worse we would be if you were president?
